entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Snow or ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets mixed with drizzle ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Rain beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
